title: Groad Trip: At SBT GRVL, the race to party ratio is magically aligned
content:
'SBT GRVL has shown that a top tier event where the result is extremely important for a rider like myself can still include all the other ingredients that make gravel special.'

Read the full article at Groad Trip: At SBT GRVL, the race to party ratio is magically aligned on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
